artist: Artist: Wu Changshuo; Carver: Bao Xi
creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Red and yellow flowers on one side, blue and pink flowers on opposite side
dimension: 13 x 18 1/2 x 13/16 in. (33 x 47 x 2.1 cm) (unfolded)
inscription:
Inscriptions; Stamps; Tag

untranslated inscriptions, carved into each end piece of bamboo; untranslated inscriptions, in black, at UR corner on each side;
markings: 2 seals, in red, at UR corner on each side; seal, in red, at LL corner on side with red flowers; dealer\'s tag, on bottom
title: Chrysanthemums
